name: Saw the Dead
description:
This is a puzzle game unlike you've ever seen. The object of the game is to blow the bombs up to get the weapons (usually a saw) to hit the zombies. Each level is unique and the higher you go the harder they get.

Do you think what it takes to beat all the levels? Alright then, Saw the Dead!

Features:

~ 90+ Levels
~ Many different items
~ Different zombies to kill
~ A unique brain teaser
~ Use many weapons
~ Facebook sharing

How To Play :

+ Touch to remove wooden objects or activate the bomb button
+ Use the weapon on the zombie
+ You will figure out the rest! It's a puzzle game, I can't tell you how to do it all
